import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './About.css' import AboutImg from '../../assets/about.png' import CV from '../../assets/work1.jpg' import Info from './Info' import Aos from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css' function About() { useEffect(()=>{ Aos.init({duration:1000}); },[]) return (

About Me

My Introduction

I'am a MERN stack developer with a mechanical engineering background. Passionate about technology, I've shifted into full-stack development, navigating the intersection of creativity and functionality.I have experience developing React projects and web applications.

Download CV
) } export default About
